name: Adventures of Larry the Lizard
description:
In this game, you not only control yourself but also pupeteer your enemies to your victory!

How to play:

  • Use 'A' and 'D' keys in order to move around.
  • Use 'Space' in order to reset the level in case your AI enemies don't go where you intended them to be.
  • Press Escape to pause.
  • Each level contains a worm, this is your ticket to the next level!

Note:
This is my first ever game for a GameJam (and in my life, tbf). I might continue on making it because I have quite a few ideas to add afterwards and I enjoyed the making process. :) Any feedback appreciated!
